posts.post_title: F/S 1911 Southern Indiana Baseball Champs Postcard sold thanks
posts.post_content:
For Sale is an unused 1911 Indiana Southern Season Champions Postcard.
The team is listed as the "Seal Backs"

Sold thanks
Please private message me if interested.

Payment by Money order or check only please.
Thanks for looking.
Tim Kindler
